Regarding the recent Facebook fan page event, Dev found some error in there previous payout, resulting in only some participants receiving the reward.

Dev are looking into the issue as we speak and will need some time to recitify it.
If you cant train above level 5, you probably have to clear cache or re-install the app

Gaea Customer Support Site: https://gaea.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Rules for Christian's XW KOM chat:

 If you have a problem or complaint, suggest a solution for it.

 Do not create a negative atmosphere. Take that to the forums or Rant Chat. 

No memes or stickers (there are chats for those & they take up a lot of space)

No server politics

No trolling, attacking, or harassing other members in this chat. Take it to pm or GC. 

 It's ok if you are angry, but avoid name calling, cursing and accusations. Treat other members with respect.

 Keep mostly to KOM topics, or info is lost in the chatter.

 Please let admins invite new members, or remove problem members. (The exception is that any member can remove someone who is trying to nuke the chat.)
